page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE 6.
page.content: The nearest shops to our house are either in Appledore or Hamstreet villages. I usually shop at the VG stores in Hanstreet during the week(VG means Village Grocers). However, my big shopping once a week is done at Sainsburys Supermarket in Ashford. I am very lucky as my husband does this for me as he is in Ashford and it saves me time and petrol. We usually purchase fresh meat each week from Supermarket which I then put into the freezer to be used as required. Most of our food is purchased from the Supermarket except for fresh vegetables, eggs and milk. The milk is delivered to the door by our milkman who calls every day. The eggs and vegetables are usually purchased from the VG or from a lady who runs a smallholding just down the road.These are stored in my fridge.
